author: leosimons
msg: fix xdok10.dtd to actually be the documented subset of xhtml.
* xdok10.dtd: change DTD to IGNORE a bunch of xhtml modules.
* validate: fix up script to work a little more as advertised, actually validating all the files instead of index.html repeatedly and properly exporting the xml catalog variable.
* TODO.txt: set up the XHTML subset.

author: pherweg
msg: RTF: Don't set \brsp at tables, because it makes them look quite broken.
